name: Echo of life
description:
A little game release for the construct game jam 4 with few members of Antarka on superpowers.

We did'nt have much time to release the game we want. The original idea is a blind guy that's seek the three of life. Echo are link to the power to view the map around us with the sound.

That make : Once upon a time : Echo of life !

Controls are made for french and english people. You can use arrow keys as well.

All graphics, code and sounds are created by us.

Credits :

Fraxken, Xstoudi, Purexo, Fantom, Ray, Captainfive
